channel.title: CVE Feed for ABB, Busch-Jaeger -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ABB, Busch-Jaeger -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-4008|2024-06-05T17:15:56.523Z -- abb%2C%20busch-jaeger -- 2.4%21%20display%2055%2C%20sd%2Fu12.55.11-825
item.description: FDSK Leak in ABB, Busch-Jaeger, FTS Display (version 1.00) and BCU (version 1.3.0.33) allows attacker to take control via access to local KNX Bus-System

item.title: CVE-2024-4009|2024-06-06T13:55:44.509Z -- abb%2C%20busch-jaeger -- 2.4%21%20display%2055%2C%20sd%2Fu12.55.11-825
item.description:
Replay Attack
in ABB, Busch-Jaeger, FTS Display (version 1.00) and BCU (version 1.3.0.33) allows attacker to capture/replay KNX telegram to local KNX Bus-System
